Label: GeoCoordinates
Description: The geographic coordinates of a place or event.

Label: GeoShape
Description: The geographic shape of a place represented using a textual description or geometry format.

Label: Observation
Description: An observation or data point about a feature or phenomenon.

Label: Place
Description: Entities that have a somewhat fixed physical extension such as a location or venue.

Label: PropertyValue
Description: A property-value pair representing a characteristic of another entity.

Label: S2Cell
Description: A cell in the S2 hierarchical discrete global grid system used for spatial indexing and representation. S2 cells are square-shaped cells that tessellate the Earth's surface in a hierarchical manner for efficient geospatial data processing.

Label: asWKT
Description: A Well-Known Text serialization of a geometry object conforming to the GeoSPARQL WKT literal format.

Label: additionalType
Description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies.

Label: description
Description: A description of the item.

Label: elevation
Description: The elevation of a location measured in meters (WGS 84 datum).

Label: geo
Description: The geo coordinates or geographic shape of a place.

Label: identifier
Description: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, UUIDs etc.

Label: latitude
Description: The latitude of a location in decimal degrees (WGS 84). For example 37.42242.

Label: longitude
Description: The longitude of a location in decimal degrees (WGS 84). For example -122.08585.

Label: measuredProperty
Description: The measuredProperty of an Observation, typically via its StatisticalVariable. A property being measured.

Label: name
Description: The name of the item.

Label: observationAbout
Description: The subject matter of the observation, typically a feature or entity being observed.

Label: observationDate
Description: The observationDate of an Observation, typically expressed as a date or datetime value.

Label: propertyID
Description: A commonly used identifier for the characteristic represented by the property.

Label: unitCode
Description: The unit of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (3 characters) or a URL.

Label: unitText
Description: A string or text indicating the unit of measurement. Useful if the unitCode cannot be used.

Label: value
Description: The value of a PropertyValue or other structured value.

Label: variableMeasured
Description: The variableMeasured property can indicate (repeated as necessary) the variables that are measured in a dataset or observation.
